name: PharmAgent Leaderboard
description: Medical AI Agent Benchmark for evaluating clinical reasoning capabilities

queries.name: Medical Record Tasks
queries.query: SELECT participant_id as id, result.score as score, result.success_rate as accuracy FROM submissions WHERE config.subtask = 'subtask1' ORDER BY score DESC

queries.name: Confabulation Detection
queries.query: SELECT participant_id as id, result.accuracy as score, (1.0 - result.hallucination_rate) as accuracy FROM submissions WHERE config.subtask = 'subtask2' ORDER BY score DESC

queries.name: Overall Performance
queries.query: SELECT participant_id as id, AVG(CASE WHEN config.subtask = 'subtask1' THEN result.score ELSE result.accuracy END) as score, COUNT(*) as accuracy FROM submissions GROUP BY participant_id ORDER BY score DESC
